textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Inseam: 30in / 76cm Rise: 9.5in / 24cm MEASUREMENTS Imported, China. Dry clean. 52% polyester/43% cotton/5% elastane. Fabric: Jersey with fleece backing. Plush leggings are lined with fleece, providing a sleek, warm layer on the coldest days. Cozy double-knit trims the sides. Covered elastic waist. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer After freezing for years in regular stockings and leggings, and tired of uncomfortable, itchy wool tights, designer Jennifer Kim realized women needed a fresh approach to staying warm and stylish in the cold. She created Plush tights, a hosiery line offering an array of fleece-lined tights versatile enough to wear with skirts, as thermals, or on their own as sublimely soft leggings. Plush tights and leggings are cozy staples in every chic girl's wardrobe. See all Plush reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
